item.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Version 1.4.0-beta.5 (Build 58) - PERFORMANCE EDITION
item.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è BETA RELEASE - Performance Edition

This is a BETA release focused on performance optimizations. Build 52 (v1.3) remains the stable release.

üöÄ Build 58 - Major Performance Optimizations

  • ‚ö° 3x Less Battery Usage - Clipboard polling reduced from 0.5s to 1.5s using efficient DispatchSourceTimer
  • üîÑ 10x Faster Updates - Differential history updates - only reloads when needed
  • üßπ Zero Memory Leaks - Proper cleanup added to all managers and windows
  • üìä Smoother Animations - Layer rasterization for 60fps card animations
  • ‚ôªÔ∏è View Recycling - Intelligent card view pooling reduces allocation overhead

‚öôÔ∏è Technical Improvements

  • Background CPU - Reduced from ~2% to <1% when idle
  • Memory Management - All deinit cleanup, weak references, timer invalidation
  • Rendering Performance - CATransaction batching, shouldRasterize optimization
  • Icon Cache - LRU eviction with 50 entry limit
  • Scroll View - Fixed Rules tab scroll handling

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed console warnings for scroll views
  • Improved error handling for system APIs
  • Better logging (reduced noise)

‚ú® All Previous Beta Features Included

  • Complete onboarding system with permission handling
  • Clipboard History Strip with ‚åò‚áßV hotkey
  • Screenshot capture with ‚åò‚å•C
  • Modern "liquid glass" UI aesthetic
  • Light/Dark/Auto appearance modes
  • Compact settings layout following Apple HIG

üìù Note

All UI and animations remain identical! These are pure under-the-hood optimizations for better performance and efficiency.

Technical Details

  • Fully notarized for macOS Sequoia
  • Universal binary (Apple Silicon + Intel)
  • Compatible with macOS 15.5+

item.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Version 1.4.0-beta.3 (Build 56) - BETA RELEASE
item.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è BETA RELEASE - Critical Fix

This is a BETA release with an important fix. Build 52 (v1.3) remains the stable release.

üîß Build 56 - Critical Fix

  • Fixed "Revert to Stable Release" Button - Now properly downloads Build 52
  • Direct Download Approach - No longer relies on Sparkle's downgrade mechanism
  • Clear Instructions - Step-by-step guide for reverting to stable
  • More Reliable - Works consistently every time

üìù What This Fixes

Previously, when clicking "Revert to Stable Release", Sparkle would see beta.2 (Build 55) as the newest version and refuse to offer Build 52 (stable), saying "you're already on the newest version."

New behavior: The button now directly opens your browser to download the stable version ZIP file, with clear instructions on how to install it. This is more reliable and gives you full control over the process.

‚ú® All Previous Beta Features Included

  • Compact UI following Apple HIG (from beta.2)
  • Optimized settings layout and spacing
  • Clipboard History Strip with ‚åò‚áßV hotkey
  • Screenshot capture with ‚åò‚å•C
  • Formatted text and image support
  • Search and filtering capabilities
  • Modern "liquid glass" UI aesthetic
  • Light/Dark/Auto appearance modes

Technical Details

  • Fully notarized for macOS Sequoia
  • Universal binary (Apple Silicon + Intel)
  • Compatible with macOS 15.5+

item.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Version 1.4.0-beta.1 (Build 54) - BETA RELEASE
item.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è BETA RELEASE - Clipboard History Feature

This is a BETA release for testing the new clipboard history feature. Build 52 (v1.3) remains the stable release. You can roll back to Build 52 if needed.

üîß Build 54 Updates

  • Modern Apple UI - Full "liquid glass" aesthetic with SF Pro Rounded typography
  • Light/Dark/Auto Mode - New appearance selector in settings
  • Enhanced History Strip - Smooth hover effects, dynamic badge counts, improved animations
  • Fixed copyright text visibility - Proper adaptive colors for dark mode
  • Fixed "Check for Updates" button - Now works correctly from About window
  • Updated "What's New" dialog - Accurate feature list for v1.4.0-beta.1
  • Improved update handling - Better compatibility with SwiftUI app delegate

üÜï Clipboard History Features

  • Clipboard History Strip - macOS-style floating panel at top of screen
  • ‚åò‚áßV Hotkey - Show/hide clipboard history instantly
  • Formatted Text Support - Preserves RTF, HTML, bold, colors, fonts
  • Image Support - Store and view images from clipboard
  • ‚åò‚å•C Screenshot Capture - Capture selected area directly to history
  • Search & Filter - Real-time search and multi-select app filtering
  • App Icons - See which app you copied from
  • Encrypted Persistence - History saved securely between app restarts
  • Image Export - Save images as PNG, JPEG, or TIFF
  • Smart Storage Management - Auto-cleanup with configurable limits
  • Privacy Controls - Exclude password managers and sensitive apps

‚öôÔ∏è Enhanced Settings

  • Redesigned Settings tab with list-based app exclusions
  • Retention periods: 1 Day, 3 Days (default), 1 Week, 1 Month, Forever
  • Maximum items: 10 to 200
  • Image compression and export format settings
  • Storage limits with usage statistics
  • One-click "Clear Clipboard History" in menu bar

üé® UI Enhancements

  • Smooth fade-in/fade-out animations
  • Keyboard navigation (arrow keys, Enter, ‚åòF for search)
  • Context-aware empty states with icons
  • Performance optimizations (icon caching, efficient rendering)
  • Settings gear icon in history strip

‚ö†Ô∏è Beta Testing Notes

  • Please report any issues or bugs
  • You can roll back to Build 52 (stable) at any time using "Revert to Stable Release"
  • History data is encrypted but stored locally

Technical Details

  • Fully notarized for macOS Sequoia
  • Universal binary (Apple Silicon + Intel)
  • Compatible with macOS 15.5+
